original_title: From Morning to Night, When You are Away from Home, Your Father Continues to Make Me Come by Licking Me With His Tongue and With His Tongue Techniques... Karen Kaede
overview: Karen was done dirty but she loved it. By the father of her husband no less.  The incident left me confused but kind of wanting more.
title: From Morning to Night, When You are Away from Home, Your Father Continues to Make Me Come by Licking Me With His Tongue and With His Tongue Techniques... Karen Kaede
